inventory.commentary: 24AUG06 - update to wn2.1, added features. ahouston

sense.name: gain
sense.commentary: INCREASE[+event][+enlargement] [+quantity][+amount][+gain] addition, gain, increment, growth - a process of becoming larger or longer, or more numerous or more important
sense.examples: There was an increase in property taxes this year. They recorded the cattle's increase in weight over a period of weeks. The increase in unemployment went unnoticed. These recent increases in the price of oil have impacted the markets. They proposed an increase of 15% in the fare. He gave me an increase in salary.
